price: 32. ir pamatę juos, sakydavo: „Iš tiesų, jie tikrai paklydę!“
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-awhum qālū inna hāulāi laḍāllūna
